thread.title: Steven Goodwin

author: Steven Goodwin
title: Steven Goodwin
text:
Dan arrived bang on time after an email arrived this morning at 7.00 am!.
He rang 15 mins before he arrived which was excellent.
Dan changed the 2 front tyres as required taking great care with the tyres and wheels. Taking before and after photos to ensure no damage.
Great service and advice, Dan recommended that I get the tracking sorted as the old tyres had worn in an uneven way, brilliant ! I will be using these guys again and recommend them to my my work colleagues and friends.
Good Job.
